original_title: The Australian Pink Floyd Show: Eclipsed By The Moon
overview: Eclipsed By The Moon Concerts Filmed Live in Germany at Trier and Oberhausen Arenas on 12th and 13th April 2013.
tagline: And if your head explodes with dark forebodings too I'll see you on the dark side of the moon.
title: The Australian Pink Floyd Show: Eclipsed By The Moon
